verses.verse: If <S%H3588><s%> there <S%H6965>arise<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you a <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H2492>dreamer<s%> of <S%H2472>dreams,<s%> and <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H413><s%> thee a <S%H226>sign<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H4159>wonder,<s%>

And the <S%H226>sign<s%> or the <S%H4159>wonder<s%> come to <S%H935>pass,<s%> <S%H834>whereof<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, <S%H559>saying,<s%> Let us <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3045>known,<s%> and let us <S%H5647>serve<s%> them;

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H2492>dreamer<s%> of <S%H2472>dreams:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5254>proveth<s%> you, to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3426>whether<s%> ye <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

Ye shall <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H3372>fear<s%> him, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and <S%H8085>obey<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and ye shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> him, and <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto him.

And <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H2492>dreamer<s%> of <S%H2472>dreams,<s%> shall be put to <S%H4191>death;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to turn you <S%H5627>away<s%> <S%H5921>from<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> which brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> you out of the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of <S%H5650>bondage,<s%> to <S%H5080>thrust<s%> thee out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in. So shalt thou put the evil <S%H1197>away<s%> <S%H7451><s%> from the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H7130><s%> of thee.

If <S%H3588><s%> thy <S%H251>brother,<s%> the <S%H121>son<s%> of thy <S%H517>mother,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> thy <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> thy <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of thy <S%H2436>bosom,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> thy <S%H7453>friend,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is as thine own <S%H5315>soul,<s%> <S%H5496>entice<s%> thee <S%H5643>secretly,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Let us <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3045>known,<s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> nor thy <S%H1>fathers;<s%>

Namely, of the <S%H4480>gods<s%> <S%H430><s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are round <S%H5439>about<s%> you, <S%H7138>nigh<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, <S%H176>or<s%> far <S%H7350>off<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> thee, from the one <S%H4480>end<s%> <S%H7097><s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the other <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H14>consent<s%> unto him, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him; <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall thine <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H2347>pity<s%> <S%H5921><s%> him, <S%H3808>neither<s%> shalt thou <S%H2550>spare,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shalt thou <S%H3680>conceal<s%> <S%H5921><s%> him:

But <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt surely <S%H2026>kill<s%> <S%H2026><s%> him; thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H7223>first<s%> upon him to put him to <S%H4191>death,<s%> and <S%H314>afterwards<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H5619>stone<s%> him with <S%H68>stones,<s%> that he <S%H4191>die;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he hath <S%H1245>sought<s%> to thrust thee <S%H5080>away<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> which brought thee <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of <S%H5650>bondage.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and <S%H3372>fear,<s%> and shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H1697>any<s%> such <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> as <S%H2088>this<s%> is <S%H7130>among<s%> you.

If <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt <S%H8085>hear<s%> say in <S%H259>one<s%> of thy <S%H5892>cities,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> thee to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Certain <S%H376>men,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1100>Belial,<s%> are gone <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H7130><s%> you, and have <S%H5080>withdrawn<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of their <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Let us <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3045>known;<s%>

Then shalt thou <S%H1875>inquire,<s%> and make <S%H2713>search,<s%> and <S%H7592>ask<s%> <S%H3190>diligently;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if it be <S%H571>truth,<s%> and the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3559>certain,<s%> that <S%H2063>such<s%> <S%H8441>abomination<s%> is <S%H6213>wrought<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you;

Thou shalt surely <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> destroying it <S%H2763>utterly,<s%> <S%H853><s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is therein, and the <S%H929>cattle<s%> thereof, with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of it <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H7339>street<s%> thereof, and shalt <S%H8313>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> thereof every <S%H3632>whit,<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God:<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H8510>heap<s%> <S%H5769>forever;<s%> it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H5750>again.<s%>

And there shall <S%H1692>cleave<s%> <S%H3808>naught<s%> <S%H3972><s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the cursed <S%H2764>thing<s%> to thine <S%H3027>hand:<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> may <S%H7725>turn<s%> from the <S%H4480>fierceness<s%> <S%H2740><s%> of his <S%H639>anger,<s%> and <S%H5414>show<s%> thee <S%H7356>mercy,<s%> and have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> upon thee, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> thee, <S%H834>as<s%> he hath <S%H7650>sworn<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers;<s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt <S%H8085>hearken<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God.<s%>
